name: T-34: The Battle
overview: T-34: The Battle is a variant of Scorched Earth for two players. The player can activate four indicators at start: wind, gravity, landscape and direction. At the start of each round players set up tank position, aim the cannon and strength of the shot. Hitting the enemy tank ends the duel. The missile flight is shown as a side scrolling animation. The winning tank starts the next duel.
